participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and energetic, often seeking ways to improve myself despite challenges.
participant_1.background: I like to listen to upbeat music to keep me energetic when I'm running errands with my family. I am grateful for my health and my ability to enjoy the outdoors. I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart. I am not happy in my job or marriage. I have bad luck with relationships.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, with a passion for art and a desire for a better life.
participant_2.background: I would love to learn more about how to help my cats stay cool in hot weather. I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult. I fantasize about living in another country. I draw comics. I like to work out at the gym to Christian electronic dance music.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well! Just got back from a run.
Oh, nice! I like to run too, but it's so hot outside right now.
Yeah, it's been really hot here lately. I try to run in the early morning or late evening.
That's a good idea. I'm going to try that next time.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw comics, go to the gym, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I like to draw too, but I'm not very good at it.
I'm sure you're better than you think!
Thanks! I'm always trying to improve.
Well, I think you're doing great!
Thanks! That means a lot.
No problem! So, what are some of your favorite comics?
I like a lot of different comics, but some of my favorites are The Walking Dead, Saga, and Y: The Last Man.
Those are all great comics! I've read The Walking Dead and Y: The Last Man, but I haven't read Saga yet.
You should definitely check it out! It's really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a graphic designer.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a graphic designer.
It's a lot of fun! I get to create all sorts of cool things.
That sounds like a great job.
It is! I'm really lucky to have it.
Well, I'm glad you're enjoying it!
Thanks
